channel.title: Members on LPLUS Lab Home
channel.description: Recent content in Members on LPLUS Lab Home

item.title: Dr. Laurel Lawyer
item.description: Laurie is an Associate Professor in the Department of Linguistics at UC Davis, and head of the L+PLUS Lab. She has been accused of being a ‘vicious’ editor of drafts, frequently agrees to take on too many projects, and generally gives out too much work.

item.title: Fiona Brewer
item.description: Fiona is a PhD student at the University of Essex. With her background in translation, Fiona approaches language processing and bilingualism from a novel angle. It is rumoured she speaks at least 15 unrelated languages.
